game.name: Crazy Alien Dog
game.description:
Many animals have been trapped by the evil poachers who have come from another planet. These bad souls have directly attached on the wild animals and locked them all in different cages that are available in a forest. Luckily, a space super hero who is known by Crazy Dog spotted it. He has got a complete report about the sufferings and pains these animals are going through at that place. As a response, he has decided to free up all prisoners. However, he needs your help in this task. Are you ready to assist him out? Join Crazy Alien Dog and help them to start his new exciting adventure!

Although it is a dangerous mission, you can solve it out with much ease by just paying attention to the needful details. He has already entered a forest that is full of blood-thirsty souls. Your objective in this platform game is to help the three eyed dog succeed in his mission. Use his super powers, avoid rockets flying towards him, stones scattered on the road and even dangerous attacks from aliens! Try to make him survive till he finishes the mission!Â 

It is not as difficult as you thought of to break the cages and help different species of animals escape from there. All you need is achieve the goal of this HTML5 game very carefully because it is not a kind of activity poachers like it. You have a wonderful chance to save these kidnapped animals and become their hero. Do you think that you have the dare to do? Play this endless runner game and show the world that you are a true adventure champion! Collect coins to buy adorable items like clothes as well as other animal upgrades! Good luck to try more popular animal games here!
